Docs.summary: This widget display an analogic clock with two hands for hours and minutes.

Docs.param: The desired time zone's ID as specified in java.util.TimeZone or null to user the time zone specified by the user (system time zone)
Docs.summary: Indicates which time zone is currently used by this view. -or- Sets the specified time zone to use in this clock.
Docs.value: The ID of the current time zone or null if the default time zone, as set by the user, must be used
